title: Access data from bubble application
author: jason

readme: This is a proof of concept workflow showing how you would connect n8n to a Bubble data collection.
readme_zh: 这是一个概念验证工作流程，展示了如何将n8n连接到Bubble数据收集系统。
title_zh: 从气泡应用程序中获取数据
